verses.verse: <S%H4194>Dead<s%> <S%H2070>flies<s%> cause the <S%H8081>ointment<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%> to send <S%H5042>forth<s%> a stinking <S%H887>smell<s%>: so does a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5531>wickedness<s%> him that is in <S%H3368>reputation<s%> for <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%>.
A wise <S%H2450>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is at his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>; but a <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> at his <S%H8040>left<s%>.

Yes <S%H5530>also<s%>, when he that is a fool <S%H1980>walks<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, his <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H2638>fails<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and he says to every one that he is a <S%H5530>fool<s%>.

If the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> rise <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3240>you<s%>, leave not your <S%H4725>place<s%>; for <S%H4832>yielding<s%> <S%H3240>pacifies<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2399>offenses<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, as a <S%H7684>error<s%> which <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7989>ruler<s%>:
<S%H5529>Wickedness<s%> is <S%H5414>set<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4791>dignity<s%>, and the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> in low <S%H8216>place<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> as <S%H5650>servants<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He that <S%H2658>digs<s%> a <S%H1475>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into <S%H6555>it<s%>; and whoever breaks a <S%H1447>hedge<s%>, a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> shall bite <S%H5391>him<s%>.
Whoever <S%H5265>removes<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be <S%H6087>hurt<s%> with <S%H1234>it<s%>; and he that cleaves <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall be endangered <S%H5533>thereby<s%>.

If the <S%H1270>iron<s%> be <S%H6949>blunt<s%>, and he do not <S%H7043>sharpen<s%> the <S%H6440>edge<s%>, then must he <S%H1396>put<s%> to more <S%H2428>strength<s%>: but <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H3504>profitable<s%> to <S%H3787>direct<s%>.
Surely the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> will <S%H5391>bite<s%> without <S%H3908>enchantment<s%>; and a <S%H3956>babbler<s%> is no <S%H3504>better<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a wise <S%H2450>man<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H2580>gracious<s%>; but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> will swallow up <S%H1104>himself<s%>.

The <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H5531>foolishness<s%>: and the <S%H319>end<s%> of his <S%H6310>talk<s%> is <S%H7451>mischievous<s%> <S%H1948>madness<s%>.
A <S%H5530>fool<s%> also is <S%H7235>full<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%>: a <S%H120>man<s%> cannot <S%H3045>tell<s%> what shall <S%H310>be<s%>; and what shall be after <S%H5046>him<s%>, who can tell him?
The <S%H5999>labor<s%> of the <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H3021>wearies<s%> every one of <S%H3045>them<s%>, because he knows not how to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
<S%H337>Woe<s%> to <S%H776>you<s%>, O land, when your <S%H4428>king<s%> is a <S%H5288>child<s%>, and your <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>!

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are <S%H776>you<s%>, O land, when your <S%H4428>king<s%> is the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2715>nobles<s%>, and your <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>, for <S%H1369>strength<s%>, and not for <S%H8358>drunkenness<s%>!
By much <S%H6103>slothfulness<s%> the <S%H4746>building<s%> <S%H4355>decays<s%>; and through <S%H8220>idleness<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> drops <S%H1811>through<s%>.
A <S%H3899>feast<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H7814>laughter<s%>, and <S%H3196>wine<s%> makes <S%H8055>merry<s%>: but <S%H3701>money<s%> answers all <S%H6030>things<s%>.

<S%H7043>Curse<s%> not the <S%H4428>king<s%>, no not in your <S%H4093>thought<s%>; and <S%H7043>curse<s%> not the <S%H6223>rich<s%> in your <S%H2315>bedroom<s%>: for a <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> shall <S%H3212>carry<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and that which <S%H1167>has<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>.
